description: Supervisor evaluation of engagement with research group activities, attendance at meetings, practical/experimental skills, and productivity throughout the internship. Includes assessment of laboratory/research notebook and data handling.

2000-word scientific report containing abstract, background, methods, results, discussion, and references based on internship findings. Requires critical evaluation of literature, clear methodology, data presentation, and contextual analysis.

20-minute oral presentation (15 minutes + 5 Q&A) critically evaluating peer-reviewed articles relevant to the research project. Requires analysis of methods/results, connection to internship goals, and demonstration of understanding through visual aids and responses to questions.
